title: Youth University
subtitle: Educational Initiative for High School Students

overview.title: Program Overview
overview.description: Kutaisi International University (KIU) has launched a new initiative – the Youth University, a project designed for students in grades 9 to 12 from Imereti, Guria and Samegrelo-Zemo Svaneti regions.

keyFeatures: Public lectures by KIU professors and invited lecturers
Development of critical thinking and creativity

goals.title: Program Goals
goals.description: The aim of the Youth University is to increase young people's access to non-formal education, spark curiosity and a love of learning, and introduce them to university life from an early age. The program also supports the development of critical thinking, creativity, and social skills, while helping students broaden their career horizons and make informed choices about their future professions.
goals.additionalInfo: Due to high interest and demand, the project is gradually being made accessible to students from other regions as well.

title: Advancing the Frontiers
subtitle: International Conference on Algebra, Analysis, and Applications

about.title: About the Conference
about.description: The International Conference "Advancing the Frontiers — International Conference on Algebra, Analysis, and Applications" will take place on September 8-10, 2025, at Kutaisi International University, Georgia.
about.additionalInfo: This conference is a satellite event of the "XV International Conference of the Georgian Mathematical Union", which will be held on September 1-6, 2025, in Batumi, Georgia.

registration.title: Registration & Abstract Submission
registration.description: Registration is mandatory. Those wishing to present a contributed talk must submit their title and abstract by May 31, 2025.
registration.notification: Abstract acceptance notifications will be sent by June 15.
